content.question: The central significance of the Kaaba in Mecca is reflected in other Islamic architecture in that

choices.label: all mosques are placed within a wide outer courtyard to mimic the layout of the Kaaba
the plans of all mosques are oriented towards its location, as the center of Islamic prayer
all mosques include an ambulatory, as a reference to the movement of pilgrims around the Kaaba
its cube-like form constitutes the basic geometric shape on which the plan of all mosques is based

content.answer: the plans of all mosques are oriented towards its location, as the center of Islamic prayer
